nse_queries.observation: If the narrative mentions the sku count as 2.0 on page 23 but the Table/another section reflects 5.0 on page 26, kindly reconcile the factual contradiction and provide revised draft of the table along with confirmation that the same shall be updated in prospectus

In “Our Business” chapter- It is observed that the Company has made use of superlative words / adjectives like “Seasoned”, “comprehensive”, “experienced”, “extensive”, “high-quality”, “significant”, “superior”, “trusted” etc. without citing the source and basis of the same as per the instructions mentioned in Schedule VI of the SEBI (ICDR) Regulations 2018 in relation to forward-looking statements. Kindly provide the source/basis of all such statements/claims. Also include these bases in the Material Documents Chapter available for inspection. If not, kindly review and revise the same. Further, the above mentioned points are merely indicative in nature, the Merchant banker shall vet the offer document and ensure that there are no disclosures which are advertising statements and marketing statement and if there are any it shall be either be drafted in a neutral language or provide a basis for the same or removed, to that end, kindly provide a draft along with a confirmation the same shall be placed at the time of prospectus as applicable

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the Chapter (specifically on Page(s) 7), the disclosure states "With most processes handled in-house, we minimize reliance on third-party vendors". Quantify the ratio of in-house versus outsourced costs for key manufacturing processes and provide the percentage of total manufacturing cost represented by third-party vendors. Confirm that the revised disclosure shall be updated in the Prospectus. Provide revised draft.

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the Chapter (specifically on Page 154), the DRHP describes various product applications including "air filtration systems", "oil filtration", "thermal/heat insulation", "acoustic/sound insulation", "felt parts", "angle cutting parts", "foam tubing", "heat shield/thermal jackets", and "aluminium laminated foam parts". However, there is no explicit mention or quantification of the Company's R&D spend in relation to these product categories, nor is there a 3-year trend analysis of R&D spend as a percentage of revenue. Provide revised draft...

On page no. 8, it is mentioned specialized equipment. Kindly elaborate and explain the statement 'Custom Machinery for International Clients'. Clarify the CAPEX and timeline for the same. Provide revised draft.

nse_queries.text: The Company operates in the automotive sector which is covered under various government schemes including PLI for Automobile and Auto Components, FAME scheme, Automotive Mission Plan, AITF (Auto Industry Transformation Fund). Kindly specify the applicability of these schemes to the Company's operations and provide details of benefits availed or expected to be availed. If not applicable, provide rationale. Provide revised draft along with confirmation that the same shall be updated in the prospectus.

The Company operates in the toys sector which is covered under various government schemes including National Action Plan for Toys (NAPT), PLI Scheme for toys, Toy clusters, Quality Control Orders for toys. Kindly specify the applicability of these schemes to the Company's operations and provide details of benefits availed or expected to be availed. If not applicable, provide rationale. Provide revised draft along with confirmation that the same shall be updated in the prospectus.

The Company operates in the foam sector which is covered under various government schemes including PLI for Textiles (foam products), Production incentives, Environmental compliance schemes. Kindly specify the applicability of these schemes to the Company's operations and provide details of benefits availed or expected to be availed. If not applicable, provide rationale. Provide revised draft along with confirmation that the same shall be updated in the prospectus.

On page 7, the Company mentions business partner without providing the name. Kindly provide the complete name of the business partner. Provide revised draft along with confirmation that the same shall be updated in the prospectus.

On page 8, the Company mentions supplier without providing the name. Kindly provide the complete name of the supplier. Provide revised draft along with confirmation that the same shall be updated in the prospectus.

On page 9, the Company mentions a foreign distributor without providing the name. Kindly provide the complete name of the distributor and details of the business arrangement. Provide revised draft along with confirmation that the same shall be updated in the prospectus.
